long_description: These lightweight REI Oslo women's gloves feature a blend of polyester and wool for warmth. They can be worn as liners or on their own. Fabric absorbs body moisture through the natural wool fiber, then releases it into outer polyester fibers to accelerate drying. Lightweight, ergonomically constructed shape fits close to the skin; works well as liner gloves beneath shell gloves. REI Oslo gloves are specifically cut to fit women.
short_description: These lightweight REI Oslo women's gloves feature a blend of polyester and wool for warmth. They can be worn as liners or on their own.
